name: But, Plug.
description:
This game was made during Global Game Jam 2020. The theme was "Repair". It is available for both Mac and Windows.

Play solo, or connect up to 8 controllers at once! 

You will need either an Xbox One controller, PlayStation 4, or an Xbox 360 controller to play.

Controls:

     Left Joystick - Move your assigned tentacle

     Left Face Button (X on Xbox, Square on PlayStation) - Drink water

     Bottom Face Button (A on Xbox, X on PlayStation) - Plug holes

     Escape Key - Quit the game at any point

To have extra players join mid-game, simply press the bottom face button on a connected controller and they will join with their own specially colored tentacle.

The Team:

     Nick Buscemi

     Alex Nicoletta

     Nolan Sadowski

     Julia Singh
